article_title: Attorneys pushing for quick appeal of same-sex marriage ruling
article_text:

article_metadata.description: Attorneys on the losing side of Thursday’s same-sex marriage ruling by a federal appeals court based in Cincinnati are pushing to get their case to the U.S. Supreme Court “as soon as possible” so justices can decide the case in their current term, which ends in June.
